#summary One-sentence summary of this page.

= Project managers, mentors, and supervisors? =

We need project managers, mentors, and supervisors to keep everything on track and *keep the initiative moving on forward*!


== What is in it for you, if you join?==

Showcase your talent. Gain experience. Work for a good cause. Save the environment. Help change the world and make it a littlebit better place. 

== What to do? ==

Your tasks will include recruiting partners, increasing visibility, networking, collaborating, gathering and organizing ideas, etc.
